Title: Relates to comptroller oversight of tribal-state compacts prior to federal approval
Summary: Directs the comptroller to review and provide a recommendation of approval or modifications, for submission for federal approval of any tribal-state compact approved or executed between the state of New York, the governor, or their designee and an Indian nation or tribe.
LawCode: Amd ยง8, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state finance law, in relation to comptroller oversight of tribal-state compacts prior to federal approval
